DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Stem Cell Transplant Module Summary Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure a pediatric stem cell transplant recipient's health-related quality of life._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
